comentarios_parciales.positivo:
Me gustaron muchas cosas:
1. Su ubicaci贸n incre铆ble, en un lugar muy lindo seguro y central.
2. El personal Calido, amable y siempre pendiente de ti.
3. Su decoraci贸n es 煤nica cuidan cada detalle para que disfrutes y te sientas como en casa.
4. La comida deli.

7. Un lugar realmente tranquilo y 煤nico para venir a descansar y llevarte un buen recuerdo.

Un lugar super agradable que te muestra una cara muy linda de Barranquilla empezando por su personal con verdadera calidad humana.

Considero que deben revisar varios puntos para poder mejorar:
1. Los desayunos son muy ricos pero cuando se realizan pedidos extras se demoran hasta 30 min ejemplo: pedimos un omelette y duro una eternidad en llegar.
2. El tema del desayuno es organizado pero a veces se enredan mucho y afectan a los hu茅spedes ejemplo llegamos y no hab铆an platos limpios duramos m谩s de 15 min esperando .....
3. La piscina es muy linda y cuenta con una vista incre铆ble, pero nos metimos y estaba muy sucia se puede mejorar el tema del aseo.
4. El jugo de corozo sabe Super fermentado como si no estuviera fresco y esto resta puntos a la experiencia.
5. El tema del aire acondicionado es muy inc贸modo uno no lo puede manejar cada vez que quiere apagarlo, modificar la temperatura o la intensidad debe llamar a la recepcion. Deber铆a evaluarse el mecanismo.

comentarios_parciales.positivo:
The Crowne Plaza Barranquilla is the perfect hotel to stay at in Barranquilla! We stayed there during the Copa America, and it was wonderful to see the staff wearing Colombia jerseys, especially when Colombia was playing. The front desk was incredibly sweet and especially kind to my mom, who was born and raised in Barranquilla but hadn't returned to Colombia in a very long time. Bringing her to the Crowne Plaza was a lovely welcome home, and she loved her stay.
I was especially impressed with every member of the front desk, particularly Wilson and Maria Fernanda, who were so accommodating to our needs. They helped us with taxis and recommended great restaurants in Barranquilla. My experience watching the Copa America was truly memorable.
I also loved the bartender at the San Blas restaurant, who always had a smile on his face when I asked for a limonada de coco. Alvaro at the rooftop bar was patient with my husband, who is still learning Spanish, when he requested a double shot of Old Parr with ice. I cant remember the name of the bartender at night on the rooftop, but he was fantastic, teaching my husband more Spanish words. My husband is a big fan of his delicious margaritas.
Kayla (I hope I spelled her name right) provided a wonderful massage and facial. She was excellent and kind.
Most importantly, thank you for making our Colombia vacation a memorable one for my mom, husband, older sister, and me. Thank you for the amazing hospitality! 
El Crowne Plaza Barranquilla es el hotel perfecto para hospedarse en Barranquilla. Nos quedamos all铆 durante la Copa Am茅rica y fue maravilloso ver al personal usando la camiseta de Colombia, especialmente cuando jugaba la selecci贸n. El personal de la recepci贸n fue incre铆blemente amable y especialmente atento con mi mam谩, quien naci贸 y creci贸 en Barranquilla, pero no hab铆a regresado a Colombia en mucho tiempo. Traerla al Crowne Plaza fue una c谩lida bienvenida, y le encant贸 su...

Es un alojamiento dise帽ado para estudiantes, las instalaciones son modernas, camas c贸modas Semi-Dobles, en Venezuela solo se usan tama帽os Individual, matrimonial, queen, etc, una semidoble es mas grande que una individual y pod铆amos dormir c贸modamente 1 adulto y 1 ni帽o.
El aire esta ubicado en la Sala y las habitaciones cuentan con ventilador, en nuestro caso prend铆amos el aire y dejamos las puertas abiertas y hab铆a mucho fr铆o, viajamos con una delegaci贸n de Futbol infantil, y para ellos fue super c贸modo.
Los ba帽os cuentan con agua caliente y te dan algunos insumos (Shampoo, jab贸n, papel sanitario) para estancias cortas.
La ubicaci贸n para nuestro caso fue id贸nea, a 9 minutos de la cancha de la Universidad Poliautonoma de Barranquilla.
Tienen cerca las siguientes tiendas, nos 铆bamos a pie y era super cerca: ara, olimpica, burger king, pollos krispy, comida china, pasteler铆a, una tienda similar a Dollar Tree, issimo, pod铆amos recargar insumos sin problemas.
Los chicos de recepci贸n nos ayudaron TODOS los d铆as en ubicarnos Taxis para movilizarnos, super atentos.
La piscina es grande y no es profunda, ideal para ni帽os, el 谩rea de parrillera bien c贸moda y en la noche hace mucha brisa.
Lo recomiendo considerando las cosas que les meciono ac谩 abajo de lo que NO me gust贸.
comentarios_parciales.negativo:

Solo hay 1 olla para cocina y 1 solo sarten, 1 solo cuchillo que corta, no hay rallador, ni licuadora.

Las camas tienen s谩banas, pero NO cuentan con cobijas o edredones, es algo que deben llevarse aparte.

Todas las habitaciones tienen un peque帽o closet para guardar la ropa, pero No tienen ganchos para guindar, ni plancha.

En las ma帽anas 6:30 am, me despertaba el radio del restaurante, las chicas que cocinaban eran alegres, pero ese ruido me despertaba.

No tenian lampazo, coleto, mopa en el apartamento.

A pesar de ello llegu茅 a las 9 am y hablando con el personal me permitieron dejar mis pertenencias en mi habitaci贸n ya que no iba a volver sino hasta la noche y para no estar cargando con ellos, amablemente accedieron a ello.

Personal super amable y atento. A pesar de estar hospedado para carnavales el hotel no estaba lleno.

El desayuno tipo buffet muy rico todo. Opciones de yogurt, granola, cereal, cayeye, queso rayado, arroz, butifarra + salchicha, pan, caf茅, jugo de naranja, huevos revueltos, empanada, kibbeh. Hasta ahora tiene el horario m谩s amplio para dar el desayuno, de 7:00 am a 10:00 am.

Permitieron guardar mis pertenencias en el hotel luego de hacer el check out (tipo 9 am) para turistear/ pasear c贸modo y luego volver por ellas m谩s tarde sin cargos ni costos adicionales.

comentarios_parciales.Registro: Fecha del comentario: 20 de enero de 2025
comentarios_parciales.positivo: Firstly, working with CTG was excellent. Professional, courteous, efficient, and honest. The apartment met our needs fine. I will say, its a little small but very comfortable for 4. One thing worth mentioning, since the rooms are small, there is only room for one night stand and no room to walk or even get out of the bed on the opposite side... in case that's important to someone reading. It didn't bother us too much. Pretty much forgot about it after the first night. Our apartment had everything we needed; coffee maker, pots, pans, plates and such. A washing machine that has kind of a dry function but not really. hang in closet to dry or use the washer dryers in the building. TV was good, nice bathroom with walkin closet. I just really loved the accommodations overall. We were on the 11th floor. Nice night time view of the city. Go to the 13 floor which is the top of the building and your get a Fantastic view of Barranquilla. The jacuzzi is up there too. The building is kept exceptionally clean. There is a small fitness room, a laundry room there as well. All in all a great host, staff is nice, great apartment over all, highly recommended.
comentarios_parciales.negativo: If I have to give one criticism, its the bed. While I won't say the mattress was uncomfortable, it wasn't particularly comfortable either. Same for the pillows.

comentarios_parciales.Registro: Fecha del comentario: 20 de marzo de 2024
comentarios_parciales.positivo: Very Nice modern apartment, in a very modern and well kept building .. the location of the building is in the North of the city which is the only place to stay, but its probably on ten edge of the "trendy area" however its still surrounded by reastuartsn, supermarkets and some bars. and nothing is far by Uber which are very cheap.
comentarios_parciales.negativo:
Overall, the initial impression upon arrival at the accommodation was positive as the place was spotless. However, the frequency of cleaning throughout the stay did not meet expectations. Despite staying for 19 nights, there was only one cleaning session scheduled. This approach did not seem to take into account the length of the stay, which is problematic. 

The standard of cleanliness during the stay was subpar, especially considering the extended duration. Changing bedding and towels and cleaning the bathroom every 10 days is insufficient. In comparable establishments, cleaning every 5 days or even every 3 days would be considered more appropriate, particularly given the price point.

comentarios_parciales.negativo:
Hallo, meine Erfahrung mit der Reservierung war sehr unangenehm. der Reservierungskoordinatorin war 眉berhaupt nicht freundlich, ver盲chtlich durch Whatsapp-Nachrichten und per Telefonanruf. empfahl mir sofort, die Reservierung zu stornieren, wenn ich nicht per Bank眉berweisung einzahlen kann. ich sagte nat眉rlich, ich will nicht stornieren. 
Ich hatte eine Menge Komplikationen, weil sie die sofortige Zahlung per Visa-Karte nicht erm枚glichten. 
Also musste ich mehr als 5 stunden auf einen link warten, um herauszufinden, ob ich mit visa bezahlen kann und ob ich wirklich in dieser wohnung bleiben kann (am tag zuvor am nachmittag).

Ich spreche perfekt Spanisch und das Schwierigste war die Gereiztheit der Dame, wenn ich die Textnachrichten noch einmal lese, merke ich wieder, dass sie in Sachen Verwaltung 眉berhaupt nicht professionell sind. 
Sie zeigten keinen Willen zu helfen, sondern eher so, als ob sie mir unfreiwillig einen Gefallen tun w眉rden.

comentarios_parciales.Registro: Fecha del comentario: 25 de febrero de 2025
comentarios_parciales.positivo: My mom and I traveled for the Shakira concert last minute and found this hotel with available lodging. The woman working in the morning was amazing! She noticed my mom had a wheelchair and offered a bigger room for us for the next day! The room was safe there is always someone there 24/7 and they lock up at night. The place was very festive for carnival and authentic Colombian style.
comentarios_parciales.negativo:
Now for the cons: the area at night is very dangerous and street seller style. Definitely not the center for tourists. It's the historic center which is mostly warehouses and street vendors. Didn't feel safe at all walking but ride shares are so cheap there it doesn't really matter. Just dont walk around at night. The hot water is non existent and there's is no shower head. Just lukewarm water coming at you like a water hose. Beds were also hard as a rock and the tv remotes do not work properly.
Overall it does the trick if you do not plan on staying in your room much. My mother and I had a great time at carnival and at the Shakira concert!
Que viva Barranquilla!

comentarios_parciales.positivo:
This apartment definitively surpassed my original expectations. From the very beginning the host (Maria) was very attentive, communicative and really helped out on making sure everythingbwent smoothly. 
The apartement was in pristine condition, extremely clean and the location was incredible (you can easily walk to the supermarket, shops and restaurants all nearby). This apartment is located in one of the best and safest zones in Barranquilla and it made everything much easier. 
I will definitively recommend this stay to anyone coming to Barranquilla Colombia. Just make sure that you have whatsapp installed in your phone since it will really help in the communications with your host. I will rate this stay a 10/10.

Overall, the room and hotel was ok. However, considering that we payed !! 380 USD !! for one night (during Carnaval), the price/performance ratio was the worst I have ever seen!

The room was located directly at the entrance (101). We heard every word spoken at the reception. And the door bell was very loud.
WiFi wasn't working properly in the room as the signal was too weak.
Only cold water to shower
Breakfast: one small plate (no buffet)

It was a last minute booking during Carnaval. However, the exorbitant price justified and an impudence. I would not mention these issues if it wasn't for this fortune!
